name: unregistry
description: Unregistry is a self-hosted Docker registry browser that presents images, tags, and metadata from container registries in a user-friendly web interface.
features: Registry browsing: Browse Docker registry contents through a user-friendly web interface.
Image listing: View all images stored in your Docker registry with metadata and details.
Tag management: See all tags for each image with creation dates and sizes.
Metadata display: View image manifests, layers, and configuration details.
Search functionality: Search for images and tags across your registry quickly.
Multi-registry: Connect to multiple Docker registries from a single interface.
Image details: Inspect image layers, sizes, and digest information for troubleshooting.
Tag deletion: Delete unused tags to reclaim storage space in your registry.
Visual interface: Navigate registry contents visually instead of using command-line tools.
Authentication support: Connect to registries with authentication requirements securely.
Responsive design: Access registry browser from desktop or mobile devices.
Read-only mode: Browse registry contents safely without accidental modifications.
